# Progress Component

### Progress

**Exports:**
- `Progress` - Progress bar component

**Usage:**
```svelte
<script lang="ts">
	import { Progress } from 'kampsy-ui';
</script>

<Progress value={80} />
```

## Installation

```bash
pnpm i -D kampsy-ui@latest
```

## Documentation

Visit http://ui.kampsy.xyz/progress for full documentation and examples.
